desc: A Christ-centered inspired merchandise brand for the generation! We believe that in our human form we are a walking purpose, so it is imperative for us to walk in such purpose and act on the gifts of grace Jehovah God has released to us all. 1 Peter 4:10 NCV is our mission scripture 🙏🏾

layout.text:
“Each of you has received a gift to use to serve others. Be good servants of God's various gifts of grace.” (1 Peter 4:10) NCV
Everyone has their own unique gift, character traits, and abilities that can be put to good use. It is our duty to take these and FLY!! These abilities can be used anywhere and anyhow, but with this movement, I am challenging you to take your God-given gifts, and display them, starting within your very homes to your local place of worship!
